name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The United States Postal Service announced on its official website on February 5 that it will resume accepting all international inbound mail and packages from China and Hong Kong Post. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjCSmRXbQAAV1j9.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 5, someone uploaded a video of White House spokesperson Levitt answering reporters' questions. Many netizens compared her with the spokesperson of the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs: "Confident and sunny, no need to have a stern face or flip answers"
"No need to pause for 40 seconds and then say I don't know the relevant situation"
"I understand everything she says in English, but I don't understand the Chinese we say in the same position" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887173342152859648/pu/img/b8L_yn76I3fsTQfH.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 5, Hegang, Heilongjiang. The man said he became disabled in an accident in 2008 and could only move his head. In 2012, he applied for government assistance because he had spent all his savings. The government cancelled the assistance in 2023, and the minimum living allowance in January 2024. At the end of last year, the government asked him to return 96,000 yuan in assistance over the years. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887210788722786304/pu/img/6aP48GaiNhTVm1Cx.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In the early morning of February 6, Yangzhong City, Jiangsu Province.
The rear windows of many cars on the city streets were smashed, and several "9.3 Anti-Fascist War Memorial Day" leaflets were stuffed into each car. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887315951189651457/pu/img/Sxr4mB5jBR5gySUG.jpg
